entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
